doc: This schema represents a numerical value with a unit of measure.

fields.name: value
fields.doc: The numeric value of the element.

fields.name: unit
fields.doc: The unit of measure of the element. Allowed values are drawn from the "Common synonyms (non UCUM)" column of [subset of] UCUM, SI and English units listed on http://www.hl7.de/download/documents/ucum/ucumdata.html . Other units may be derived.
